channel.title: USB Remote on Virtual box
channel.description: excuse me if im in the wrong place but i need some information about the topic, i have a virtual machine installed in my pc, what i need is, i have a remote server where i have a shared usb port, i capture it in my vrtual box guest and i need to use it in the host pc without usage of any software, can i have this or its impossible, i apologize for my english
